## spiClose() function

This closes the SPI device.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function spiClose(handle: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  handle | number | The SPI device handle as returned by [spiOpen()](./lgpio.spiopen.md) |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
